targets.query: SELECT "Monitor Flags" FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a')
SELECT "Battery Voltage" * "PV Total Current" FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Battery Voltage" * "Battery Current"   FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Battery Voltage" * ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT  "ADC4" * "ADC4" /2.16 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("PV Total Current" * "Battery Voltage") / 120 / 1000 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT ("Battery Current" + ABS("Battery Current"))/2 * "Battery Voltage" / 120 / 1000  FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT (-"Battery Current" + ABS("Battery Current"))/2 * "Battery Voltage" / 120 / 1000  FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "Battery Voltage" * ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") / 120 / 1000 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "ADC4" * "ADC4" / 2.16 / 120 / 1000 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT  (315 *(100 - "State of Charge")  / 100) /  (("Battery Current" +ABS("Battery Current")) / 2 ) * 60 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE time > now() -30s
SELECT  (315 *(100 - "State of Charge")  / 100) /  (("Battery Current" +ABS("Battery Current")) / 2 ) * 60 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE time > now() -15m
SELECT  (315 *(100 - "State of Charge")  / 100) /  (("Battery Current" +ABS("Battery Current")) / 2 ) * 60 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE time > now() -1h
SELECT  (315 * "State of Charge" / 100) / ((-"Battery Current" + ABS("Battery Current"))/2 ) *60 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE time > now() -30s
SELECT  (315 * "State of Charge" / 100) /  ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") / 2 * 60  FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE time > now() -1h
SELECT  (315 * "State of Charge" / 100) /  ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") / 2 * 60  FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE time > now() -24h
SELECT "PV Total Current" * "Battery Voltage" FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") * "Battery Voltage" FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "ADC4" * "ADC4" / 2.16 FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Battery Current" * "Battery Voltage" FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("Battery Voltage") FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("Battery Voltage") FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT ("Internal Temperature") FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT ("Internal Temperature") FROM "SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 1" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 2" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 3" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 4" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 5" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 6" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 7" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "Cell 8" FROM "autogen"."SBMS_Metrics" WHERE ("Name" = 'SBMS0a') AND $timeFilter
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM (SELECT ("PV Total Current" * "Battery Voltage") / 120 / 1000 AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics" ) WHERE time > now() - 6d  GROUP BY time(1d) TZ('Europe/Ljubljana')

SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM ( SELECT "Battery Voltage" * ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") / 120 / 1000 AS Energy  FROM "SBMS_Metrics"   ) WHERE time > now() - 6d GROUP BY time(1d)  TZ('Europe/Ljubljana')
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM ( SELECT "ADC4" * "ADC4" / 2.16 / 120 / 1000  AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics"   ) WHERE time > now() - 6d  GROUP BY time(1d) TZ('Europe/Ljubljana')
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM (SELECT ("PV Total Current" * "Battery Voltage") / 120 / 1000 AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics" ) WHERE time > now() - 5w GROUP BY time(1w, 4d) TZ('Europe/Ljubljana')

SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM ( SELECT "Battery Voltage" * ("PV Total Current"-"Battery Current") / 120 / 1000 AS Energy  FROM "SBMS_Metrics"  )  WHERE time > now() - 5w GROUP BY time(1w, 4d)  TZ('Europe/Ljubljana')
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM ( SELECT "ADC4" * "ADC4" / 2.16 / 120 / 1000  AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics"   ) WHERE time > now() - 5w GROUP BY time(1w, 4d) TZ('Europe/Ljubljana')
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM (SELECT ("PV Total Current" * "Battery Voltage") / 120 / 1000 AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics" )
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM ( SELECT "ADC4" * "ADC4" / 2.16 / 120 / 1000  AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics"   )
SELECT SUM(Energy) FROM (SELECT ("PV Total Current" * "Battery Voltage") / 120 / 1000 AS Energy FROM "SBMS_Metrics" ) where time  >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' and time < '2022-02-01 00:00:00'
